title: Pre-existing TypeScript errors in widget and server test files
issue: Multiple test files in widget and server packages have pre-existing TypeScript errors that prevent pnpm typecheck and pnpm build from passing. These errors include: type mismatches in mock objects, possibly undefined objects, unused variables, and missing type-only imports. Widget has ~40 errors across useCobrowse.test.ts, useSignaling.test.ts, VideoSequencer.test.tsx, LiveCallView.test.tsx, useWebRTC.test.ts, main.test.ts, and Widget.test.tsx. Server has ~25 errors across agentStatus.test.ts, stripe-webhook-handler.test.ts, pool-manager.test.ts, socket-handlers.test.ts, and health.test.ts.
suggestion: These test files need TypeScript type fixes to allow builds to pass. This is blocking full CI/CD validation. Recommend creating tickets to fix test file type errors in both widget and server packages.
